jade.ui
Interface Camera

public interface Camera

An interface used by Terminal to draw the cells visible on a World at a specific location. Notice that for an Actor to implement the interface, only getViewField() is needed. Thus it would be easy to always show what a specific Actor can see.

Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<Coordinate> getViewField()
          Returns the current view field of the Camera
 World world()
          Returns the World the Camera is observing.
 int x()
          Returns the x location of the Camera.
 int y()
          Returns the y location of the Camera.
